description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & Mango Frappe recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pineapple & Mango Frappe Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225 g can pineapple pieces in natural juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 peeled, chopped banana, a chilled 225g can pineapple pieces in natural juice, 1 cup frozen mango pieces, 1/2 cup Greek-style natural yoghurt, 1/2 cup chilled pineapple or apple juice and 4 ice cubes into a blender. Blend until mixture is smooth and frothy. Crush another 8 ice cubes and spoon into glasses.
